title: Strengthening App Development Practical Competencies: Enhancing Learner Satisfaction in Blended and Online Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced social domain expertise and foundational online learning experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain three criteria for evaluating the quality of instructional materials in blended learning environments
Learners can propose at least two methods for structuring modules that consider workplace relevance in online learning design
Learners can apply a process for planning and executing self-directed learning in smartphone-based environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
